patthana1.9:127.1_0: Nahetuyā satta, naārammaṇe pañca, naadhipatiyā sattarasa, naanantare pañca, nasamanantare
patthana1.9:127.1_1: pañca, naaññamaññe pañca, naupanissaye pañca, napurejāte satta, napacchājāte sattarasa,

patthana1.9:129.1_1: pañca, naaññamaññe pañca, naupanissaye pañca, napurejāte satta, napacchājāte sattarasa,

patthana1.9:131.1_0: Nahetupaccayā ārammaṇe satta, anantare satta, samanantare satta, sahajāte satta,
patthana1.9:131.1_1: aññamaññe satta, nissaye satta, upanissaye satta, purejāte satta, āsevane satta,

patthana1.9:134.1_1: pahātabbaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ saṁsaṭṭhā tayo khandhā …pe… dve khandhe saṁsaṭṭhā dve khandhā.

patthana1.9:136.1_1: pahātabbo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbaṁ ekaṁ

patthana1.9:138.1_3: tīṇi, vippayutte tīṇi, atthiyā tīṇi, natthiyā tīṇi, vigate tīṇi, avigate tīṇi.

patthana1.9:148.1_1: tīṇi, nissaye tīṇi, upanissaye tīṇi, purejāte tīṇi, āsevane tīṇi, kamme tīṇi, vipāke

patthana1.9:151.1: Dassanena pahātabbo dhammo dassanena pahātabbassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo—dassanena pahātabbā hetū sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ hetupaccayena paccayo.

patthana1.9:153.1_1: ca dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo—dassanena pahātabbā hetū sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ
patthana1.9:154.1: Bhāvanāya pahātabbo dhammo …pe… dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo—bhāvanāya pahātabbā hetū sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ hetupaccayena paccayo.

patthana1.9:157.1_1: dhammassa …pe… nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbā hetū sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ
patthana1.9:157.1_2: cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṁ hetupaccayena paccayo. Paṭisandhikkhaṇe nevadassanena

patthana1.9:158.1_0: Dassanena pahātabbo dhammo dassanena pahātabbassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—dassanena
patthana1.9:158.1_1: pahātabbaṁ rāgaṁ assādeti abhinandati, taṁ ārabbha dassanena pahātabbo rāgo uppajjati,
patthana1.9:158.1_2: diṭṭhi uppajjati, vicikicchā uppajjati. Dassanena pahātabbaṁ domanassaṁ uppajjati,
patthana1.9:158.1_3: diṭṭhiṁ assādeti abhinandati, taṁ ārabbha dassanena pahātabbo rāgo uppajjati, diṭṭhi
patthana1.9:158.1_4: uppajjati, vicikicchā uppajjati. Dassanena pahātabbaṁ domanassaṁ uppajjati, vicikicchaṁ
patthana1.9:158.1_5: ārabbha vicikicchā uppajjati, diṭṭhi uppajjati, dassanena pahātabbaṁ domanassaṁ uppajjati.
patthana1.9:158.1_6: Dassanena pahātabbaṁ domanassaṁ ārabbha dassanena pahātabbaṁ domanassaṁ uppajjati,
patthana1.9:159.1_0: Dassanena pahātabbo dhammo nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena
patthana1.9:159.1_1: paccayo—ariyā dassanena pahātabbe pahīne kilese paccavekkhanti, pubbe samudāciṇṇe
patthana1.9:159.1_2: kilese jānanti. Dassanena pahātabbe khandhe aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassanti.
patthana1.9:159.1_3: Cetopariyañāṇena dassanena pahātabbacittasamaṅgissa cittaṁ jānanti. Dassanena pahātabbā
patthana1.9:160.1_0: Bhāvanāya pahātabbo dhammo bhāvanāya pahātabbassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—bhāvanāya
patthana1.9:160.1_1: pahātabbaṁ rāgaṁ assādeti abhinandati, taṁ ārabbha bhāvanāya pahātabbo rāgo uppajjati,
patthana1.9:160.1_2: uddhaccaṁ uppajjati. Bhāvanāya pahātabbaṁ domanassaṁ uppajjati, uddhaccaṁ ārabbha

patthana1.9:161.1_0: Bhāvanāya pahātabbo dhammo dassanena pahātabbassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—bhāvanāya
patthana1.9:161.1_1: pahātabbaṁ rāgaṁ assādeti abhinandati, taṁ ārabbha dassanena pahātabbo rāgo uppajjati,
patthana1.9:161.1_2: diṭṭhi uppajjati, vicikicchā uppajjati, dassanena pahātabbaṁ domanassaṁ uppajjati.
patthana1.9:161.1_3: Uddhaccaṁ ārabbha diṭṭhi uppajjati, vicikicchā uppajjati, dassanena pahātabbaṁ domanassaṁ
patthana1.9:161.1_4: uppajjati. Bhāvanāya pahātabbaṁ domanassaṁ ārabbha dassanena pahātabbaṁ domanassaṁ

patthana1.9:162.1_1: paccayo—ariyā bhāvanāya pahātabbe pahīne kilese paccavekkhanti, vikkhambhite kilese
patthana1.9:162.1_2: paccavekkhanti, pubbe samudāciṇṇe kilese jānanti. Bhāvanāya pahātabbe khandhe aniccato
patthana1.9:162.1_3: dukkhato anattato vipassanti, cetopariyañāṇena bhāvanāya pahātabbacittasamaṅgissa
patthana1.9:162.1_4: cittaṁ jānanti. Bhāvanāya pahātabbā khandhā cetopariyañāṇassa, pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇassa,
patthana1.9:163.1_0: Nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbo dhammo nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbassa
patthana1.9:163.1_1: dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo—dānaṁ datvā sīlaṁ samādiyitvā uposathakammaṁ
patthana1.9:163.1_2: katvā taṁ paccavekkhati, pubbe suciṇṇāni paccavekkhati, jhānā vuṭṭhahitvā jhānaṁ
patthana1.9:163.1_3: paccavekkhati. Ariyā maggā vuṭṭhahitvā maggaṁ paccavekkhanti, phalaṁ paccavekkhanti,
patthana1.9:163.1_4: nibbānaṁ paccavekkhanti; nibbānaṁ gotrabhussa, vodānassa, maggassa, phalassa, āvajjanāya
patthana1.9:163.1_5: ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. Cakkhuṁ aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassati; sotaṁ …
patthana1.9:163.1_6: ghānaṁ … jivhaṁ … kāyaṁ … rūpe … sadde … gandhe … rase … phoṭṭhabbe … vatthuṁ … nevadassanena
patthana1.9:163.1_7: nabhāvanāya pahātabbe khandhe aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassati; dibbena cakkhunā
patthana1.9:163.1_8: rūpaṁ passati, dibbāya sotadhātuyā saddaṁ suṇāti, cetopariyañāṇena nevadassanena
patthana1.9:163.1_9: nabhāvanāya pahātabbacittasamaṅgissa cittaṁ jānanti, ākāsānañcāyatanaṁ viññāṇañcāyatanassa
patthana1.9:163.1_12: paccayo …pe… nevadassanena nabhāvanāya pahātabbā khandhā iddhividhañāṇassa, cetopariyañāṇassa,
patthana1.9:163.1_13: pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇassa, yathākammūpagañāṇassa, anāgataṁsañāṇassa, āvajjanāya ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
